Text2: Spread your brand. Not the virus.
Text3: It's time to get back to work! Protect your employees & offer them a high-end tailor-made mask showcasing your brand's identity and colors. Increase the feeling of security and the sense belonging at the same time. Fill the quick form below to see what our designers can come up with for your company.
Text5: - Made for long term use (will resist dozens of washes)
Text6: - Company's logo, size of the mask, as well as a reminder of the security measures for COVID-19 are printed on the inside.
Text9: - Fitted to face (5 sizes; XS to XL)
Text10: - Double layer of heat-treated highly stretch poly interlock
Text13: In less than a minute, fill out the information below. Our designers will send you design and price options. You can comment on your visuals. You should take the time to do so as the strength of this marketing tool should not be underestimated... Enjoy!
Select 3 colors for your company masks: Select 3 colors for your company masks
modal-text1: Within 2 business days, our designers will send you product design options & prices which you can share with your colleagues for consideration.
